item.description:
These programs are VERY popular - while some randomites have been able to attend, many have tried to register only to find out that there were no spaces available. To register read the description below and make sure you follow the instructions carefully.

=====

While we encourage you to RSVP here so you can communicate with other randomites who might be attending, you MUST register with “Becoming an Outdoors Woman New Hampshire” to secure your spot.

The Fall Weekend is the biggest event of the year – this year it will be held at the Rockywold-Deephaven Camps in Holderness, NH near Squam Lake. Participants will be able to choose from topics including map and compass, hiking, camping, outdoor cooking, wilderness first aid, kayaking, canoeing, fishing, shooting sports, hunting, and other outdoor-related topics.

  • The cost is $330, which includes instruction, materials, use of equipment, all meals and two nights lodging.
  • Registration is limited to 130 participants.
  • Click here to see the program for this year's event.
  • Registration forms will be available for download on May 31, 2012. Click here to access them.
  • Registration opens June 4, 2012 – ALL registrations must be sent via US Mail to the address on the registration form.

=====

New Hampshire's Becoming an Outdoors-Woman programs are co-sponsored by the New Hampshire Fish and Game Department and the New Hampshire Wildlife Federation.
item.name: Becoming an Outdoors Woman - Fall Weekend
